posts.raw_content:
Happy 2nd Sunday of Advent. Christ is king. And that means we have hope, which is the theme for many churches today.

Waaaaaaay too many people saying they have no hope and are believing and repeating a big fat lie even here on PDW.

If you believe you don’t have enough resources to raise 5+ kids, then you believe the first big lie the Great Replacement.

The second, is that migrants have more resources than you.  You can also throw in, your grandparents and great grandparents who had less education, made less per hour, had worse hospitals, and no internet and none of the help the migrants get today from the government.

The third is that there is no hope for you and your descendants.


Believe the lies or don’t. Have hope in Christ or don’t. That is your decision.

Best rest assured, it is a decision nonetheless.


Not a single person on the planet can tell you with any degree of confidence that 10-20 years from now the world will be better or worse for you and your family. 

We only have 2 reliable points of data over the centuries.

1. True Christians never succeeded lacking hope. Even in this country, they crossed oceans and setup farms surrounded by hostile Indians.

2. Things can get worse in periods and regions, but over time, since Christianity started spreading over the planet, things have been changing for the better.

Don’t let non-Christians have more hope in the future and this country than us Christians. If so, shame on us for not believing Christ and believing the Replacers.


So do not despair, have hope in Christ. Have hope that’s tangible.  Have hope that He is calling you to a life of love and that if He is the one calling then He will provide.

posts.raw_content:
Ashwaubenon, Wisconsin  — 

A viral video played across millions of screens in America this week showing a white woman working at a Cinnabon calling a hijab-clad Somali woman and a Somali man the N-word, before shaking her butt at them and making obscene gestures. 

She was later fired by Cinnabon.

Thousands of MAGA Americans saw the incident as yet another example of WOKE excess by liberal corporations, and a crowdfunding initiative raised over $30,000 for the woman as of last night.

President Donald Trump had recently attacked Ilhan Omar and Somali-Americans living in Minnesota generally, accusing Somalis of abetting fraud.

However, new allegations allege the entire incident was staged for maximal impact, and that the Somalis knew the white woman and plan to split the proceeds of the crowdfunding campaign.

Alexandra Wilsey, Crystal Wilsey’s estranged sister, claims that Crystal had a Somali romantic partner, Abdi Abdi Abdi, and is known by local Somalis with the endearing nickname “qumayo.” 

She claims that both Crystal and her Somali “baby daddy” rotate in and out of prison facilities in Wisconsin and nearby Minneapolis, and that Crystal’s meth habit had recently gone “out of control.”

Alexandra’s mother called her abruptly one evening sharing news clips about Crystal’s behavior as well as text messages from Crystal regarding her “get rich quick” plan. 

"She had a history of petty crimes, but this was something new altogether, " Alexandra said. "I think she and Abdi want to exploit the Somali-dominated new cycle and defraud hard-working Americans who donate to her campaign. It's cunning and cruel"

Alexandra said she doesn't know her sister's political beliefs, but that she had previously called the president "a dumb racist cunt."

Crystal did not respond to repeated attempts for comment.
posts.author: thonl
posts.title: Cinnabon chick is a setup! Just more Somali fraud.
posts.content:
Ashwaubenon, Wisconsin  — 

A viral video played across millions of screens in America this week showing a white woman working at a Cinnabon calling a hijab-clad Somali woman and a Somali man the N-word, before shaking her butt at them and making obscene gestures. 

She was later fired by Cinnabon.

Thousands of MAGA Americans saw the incident as yet another example of WOKE excess by liberal corporations, and a crowdfunding initiative raised over $30,000 for the woman as of last night.

President Donald Trump had recently attacked Ilhan Omar and Somali-Americans living in Minnesota generally, accusing Somalis of abetting fraud.

However, new allegations allege the entire incident was staged for maximal impact, and that the Somalis knew the white woman and plan to split the proceeds of the crowdfunding campaign.

Alexandra Wilsey, Crystal Wilsey’s estranged sister, claims that Crystal had a Somali romantic partner, Abdi Abdi Abdi, and is known by local Somalis with the endearing nickname “qumayo.” 

She claims that both Crystal and her Somali “baby daddy” rotate in and out of prison facilities in Wisconsin and nearby Minneapolis, and that Crystal’s meth habit had recently gone “out of control.”

Alexandra’s mother called her abruptly one evening sharing news clips about Crystal’s behavior as well as text messages from Crystal regarding her “get rich quick” plan. 

"She had a history of petty crimes, but this was something new altogether, " Alexandra said. "I think she and Abdi want to exploit the Somali-dominated new cycle and defraud hard-working Americans who donate to her campaign. It's cunning and cruel"

Alexandra said she doesn't know her sister's political beliefs, but that she had previously called the president "a dumb racist cunt."

Crystal did not respond to repeated attempts for comment.
